alert.note: Alert for Mobile Inland; Washington (Alabama) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued May 31 at 5:29PM CDT by NWS Mobile
info.description: ...A cluster of strong thunderstorms will impact portions of northwestern Mobile, southwestern Washington, eastern George and southeastern Greene Counties through 615 PM CDT... At 528 PM CDT, National Weather Service doppler radar indicated a cluster of strong thunderstorms 8 miles west of Gulfcrest, or 12 miles southwest of Citronelle, moving west at 10 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 30 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Citronelle, Lucedale, Leakesville, Chunchula, Gulfcrest, Deer Park and Wilmer. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
